contents.text: Thank you for calling AdStage, the San Francisco-based closed-loop reporting and automation platform for paid media campaigns.
For sales, demos, and new business inquiries, press 1.
To request a demo or learn about our platform features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for your demo request.

navigationGoals: Schedule a walkthrough of AdStage’s reporting and automation features for my paid media campaigns.
Schedule a product demo to evaluate AdStage for my veteran-owned marketing startup
Schedule a walkthrough of AdStage’s API-driven paid-media reporting dashboard.
I’d like to set up a guided demo of your platform so I can learn how it works.
I’d like to schedule a demo of AdStage’s reporting tools for my lab’s paid media analysis.

contents.text: For partner programs and integrations, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Get details on integrating AdStage with our existing partner tools.
Inquire about joining the AdStage partner program and integrating Google Ads for my veteran-led agency
Discuss partner integration options and access to the AdStage API sandbox.
I’m interested in joining your partner program and integrating my existing tools.
I want to explore integrating AdStage’s API with our department’s data platform.

contents.text: For customer support and account management, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with my campaign reporting dashboard.
Get technical support to fix Facebook Ads data not syncing in my AdStage dashboard
Troubleshoot an OAuth authentication error in my AdStage data connectors.
I’m having trouble accessing my account and need technical help to fix it.
I need help troubleshooting errors when I pull campaign metrics via the AdStage API.

contents.text: For billing, subscription, or invoice questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a charge on my latest invoice and update my billing information.
Request an itemized invoice for last month’s charges and adjust my subscription plan for my veteran-run agency
Review my latest invoice details and upgrade my subscription tier.
I need assistance understanding my latest invoice and subscription charges.
I need to upgrade my billing plan so I can access more historical data for my research.
